issue.summary: GeneID: 258995 (Olfr176), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: Will perform PCR analysis of this region on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: Olfr176 (GeneID:258995, NM_146993.1) is not represented in the reference genome.

issue.summary: GeneID: 140474 (Muc4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Requesting more 454 sequence data for AC139244.4/RP23-324J8
issue.description: There is an unresolved tandem repeat in reference component AC139244.4 that affects the alignment of RefSeq NM_080457.3 (Muc4).

issue.summary: GeneID: 404309 (Olfr192), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will perform PCR analysis on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference in the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_207549.1 (Olfr192) and the genomic region to which it aligns.

issue.summary: Chr. 16 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC131776.5 and AC191865.3

issue.summary: Chr. 16 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC167018.4 and AC163723.3

issue.summary: Chr. 16 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC161274.2 and AC118240.8
issue.resolution_text: The progress of this gap can now be followed in MG-4196

issue.summary: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving AC225549.3 are disrupting contig building
issue.description: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving AC225549.3 with adjacent TPF components are disrupting contig building
issue.resolution_text: TPF was resubmitted with AC225549.3 removed and AC225549.3 was marked as redundant in the Curate Sequence Information page.

issue.summary: Unmarked contained clone CT571259.11 on chr. 16 TPF
issue.description: Unmarked contained clone CT571259.11 on chr. 16 TPF
issue.resolution_text: CT571259.11 found redundant so removed from TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 258382 (Olfr208), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: We will perform PCR in an attempt to see if NM_001011792.1 should be represented in the Reference.
issue.description: NM_146384.1 does not align to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 257973 (Olfr207), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: We will perform PCR in an attempt to see if NM_001011792.1 should be represented in the Reference.
issue.description: NM_001011792.1 does not align with the Reference

issue.summary: GeneID: 73047 (Camk2n2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Will perform PCR analysis on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: An 'N' is present at nt 20620046 of NC_000082.5 (in AC087898.19)

issue.summary: Possible deletion in reference component AC133487 removes intron from Arvcf?
issue.description: There is a possible deletion in reference component AC133487.14 that removes an intron from Arvcf (NM_033474.2)
issue.resolution_text: PCR was run in the region of the deletion in AC133487.14 and FO393431.1 has been added to the TPF, correcting the ~900bp deletion.

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC164558.2
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC164558.2
issue.resolution_text: A new switchpoint has been curated for AC164558.2 and AC165282.2's overlap to include the correct base in the Reference Assembly.

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component CAAA01190929.1
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone CAAA01190929.1
issue.resolution_text: AC226122.3 was picked to replace the WGS component CAAA01190929.1. AC226122.3 agrees with AK084920.1 and the other 17 sequenced strains.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC087541.23
issue.status_text: Will perform PCR analysis on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC087541.23

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC117662.13
issue.status_text: The existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC117662.13. The Reference Sequence at position 36772531 of NC_000082.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.

issue.summary: Chrom. 16 Reference Assembly replacement of WGS
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has WGS CAAA01150599.1 spanning a gap between components AC154571.3 and CT027681.7
issue.resolution_text: AC217053.3 was sequenced to replace WGS component CAAA01150599.1

issue.summary: Chrom. 16 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between components AC159200.2 and AC154545.2.
issue.resolution_text: CU041233.10 was sequenced to close a gap between accessions AC159200.2 and AC154545.2 replacing WGS components CAAA01044359.1, CAAA01044361.1, CAAA01044364.1 and CAAA01044368.1

issue.summary: Chrom. 16 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between components AC165961.2 and CT573086.9
issue.resolution_text: CU207273.8 was sequenced to close a gap between accessions AC165961.2 and CT573086.9. CU207273.8 replaces WGS CAAA01219565.1, CAAA01107352.1, CAAA01094381.1 and CAAA01061160.1.

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC168220.1 and AC165961.2
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC168220.1 and AC165961.2 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between AC168220.1 and AC165961.2 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC241617.3 and AC118240.8 in GRCm38.
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization probes have been generated in an attempt to capture sequence in this gap.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3181

issue.summary: Possible base pair errors in region overlapped by both clones.
issue.description: AC133487.14 has one assembly error as reported in MG-3833. However in the process of resolving this issue another region was found containing possible base pair errors.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: possible mislocalization of telomeric components?
issue.description: Three components on telomeric end of Chrom. 16 may belong to telomeric end of Chrom. 11 (AC226122, AC163298, and AC225639)
issue.resolution_text: After end-sequencing, user determined that they either 1. received the wrong clone from the supplier or 2. ordered the wrong clone (RP23-296E7, not RP23-296F7). RP23-296E7 does map to the telomeric end of Chrom. 11. As of now, there doesn't appear to be a problem with GRCm38 Chrom. 16 telomere.

issue.summary: GeneID: 319823 (F630003A18Rik), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: Will perform PCR analysis of this region on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: RefSeq (NM_177010.3), representing F630003A18Rik (GeneID: 319823) aligns poorly to the reference genome
